name: Adaptability
description: The Pokemon's STAB modifier becomes 2x.

name: Aerilate
description: Turns all of this Pokemon's Normal-typed attacks into Flying-type and deals 1.3x damage. Does not affect Hidden Power.

name: Aftermath
description: Deals 25% damage when KOed by contact damage.

name: Air Lock
description: Blocks the effects of weather.

name: Analytic
description: Raises the power of all moves by 30% if the wielder moves last.

name: Anger Point
description: Raises Attack to +6 if struck by a critical hit.

name: Anticipation
description: Alerts the Pokemon of certain dangerous moves.

name: Arena Trap
description: Prevents switching and increases wild encounter rate.

name: Aroma Veil
description: Protects allies from attacks that limit their move choices.

name: Aura Break
description: Reverses the effects of Dark Aura and Fairy Aura.

name: Bad Dreams
description: Deals 12.5% damage to sleeping opponents per turn.

name: Battle Armor
description: Prevents critical hits.

name: Big Pecks
description: The wielder's Defense cannot be lowered.

name: Blaze
description: Boosts power of Fire-type moves 50% when at 1/3 of max HP or less.

name: Bulletproof
description: This Pokemon is protected from some Ball and Bomb moves.

name: Cheek Pouch
description: Increases HP when this Pokemon consumes a berry.

name: Chlorophyll
description: Speed doubles in sun.

name: Clear Body
description: Stops the enemy from lowering this Pokemon's stats.

name: Cloud Nine
description: Blocks the effects of weather.

name: Color Change
description: Changes user's type to type of last attack that hit this Pokemon.

name: Competitive
description: Raises the user's Special Attack stat by two stages when a stat is lowered, including the Special Attack stat. This does not include self-induced stat drops like those from Close Combat.

name: Compound Eyes
description: Raises accuracy by 30% and increases the probability of wild Pokemon holding items.

name: Contrary
description: The wielder's stat changes are reversed.

name: Cursed Body
description: The wielder has a 30% chance to disable any move that hits it.

name: Cute Charm
description: Can infatuate Pokemon of opposite gender when struck and increases their wild encounter rate.

name: Damp
description: Prevents the use of Self-Destruct or Explosion.

name: Dark Aura
description: Increases the power of all Dark-type moves in battle to 1.3x.

name: Defeatist
description: Halves the wielder's Attack and Special Attack if its HP drops below 50%.

name: Defiant
description: Boosts Attack by two stages for every stat drop.

name: Delta Stream
description: Summons Strong Winds until Pokemon leaves battle. Electric/Ice/Rock moves do half damage and Weather changing moves/abilities fail, except for Primordial Sea and Desolate Land.

name: Desolate Land
description: Summons Heavy Sun until Pokemon leaves battle. Water-type moves and weather changing moves/abilities fail, except for Primordial Sea and Delta Stream.

name: Download
description: User gets a stat boost depending on its opponent's stats.

name: Drizzle
description: Summons rain.

name: Drought
description: Summons sun.

name: Dry Skin
description: User absorbs Water-type attacks and has a weakness to Fire-type moves. Heals in rain and is damaged by sun.

name: Early Bird
description: Reduces sleep time by 50%.

name: Effect Spore
description: Induces paralysis, poison, or sleep on contact.

name: Fairy Aura
description: Increases the power of all Fairy-type moves in battle to 1.3x.

name: Filter
description: Reduces damage from super effective hits by 1/4.

name: Flame Body
description: Enemies' contact moves have a 30% chance to burn them. Halves the amount of steps required to hatch Eggs.

name: Flare Boost
description: Special Attack is increased by 50% when burned.

name: Flash Fire
description: Grants immunity to Fire and increases Fire's power 50% when hit by a Fire move.

name: Flower Gift
description: Raises Attack and Special Defense of this Pokemon and its partners in sun.

name: Flower Veil
description: Prevents lowering of ally Grass-type Pokemon's stats.

name: Forecast
description: Changes type according to weather.

name: Forewarn
description: Tells which of the opponent's moves has the highest Base Power.

name: Friend Guard
description: Reduces damage done to a teammate by 25%.

name: Frisk
description: Reveals the foe's items.

name: Fur Coat
description: Halves the damage done to this Pokemon by physical attacks.

name: Gale Wings
description: This Pokemon's Flying-type moves have their priority increased by 1.

name: Gluttony
description: Consumes pinch Berries at 50% HP or less.

name: Gooey
description: Contact with this Pokemon decreases the attacker's Speed by 1 stage.

name: Grass Pelt
description: This Pokemon's Defense is boosted by 50% in Grassy Terrain

name: Guts
description: Attack is increased 50% when afflicted by a non-volatile status.

name: Harvest
description: After each turn, the wielder may receive the Berry it used at a 50% chance (100% if in sun).

name: Healer
description: 30% chance to heal an adjacent teammate of a status condition every turn.

name: Heatproof
description: Reduces Fire damage 50%.

name: Heavy Metal
description: The wielder's weight is doubled.

name: Honey Gather
description: Adds a chance of finding Honey after each in-game battle.

name: Huge Power
description: Doubles Attack.

name: Hustle
description: Physical moves do 50% more damage at the cost of 20% accuracy. Increases wild encounter rate with higher level Pokemon.

name: Hydration
description: Heals status effects in rain.

name: Hyper Cutter
description: Prevents the enemy from lowering this Pokemon's Attack. Increases Cut's area of effect.

name: Ice Body
description: Heals 1/16 of max HP in hail.

name: Illuminate
description: Increases wild encounter rate (no effect in battles).

name: Illusion
description: The wielder appears as the last Pokemon in the party to the opponent.

name: Immunity
description: This Pokemon cannot be poisoned.

name: Imposter
description: The wielder transforms into the opponent when it switches in.

name: Infiltrator
description: The wielder bypasses the foe's Light Screen, Reflect, Mist, Safeguard, and Substitute.

name: Inner Focus
description: Prevents flinching.

name: Insomnia
description: Prevents sleep.

name: Intimidate
description: Lowers the foe's Attack by 1 stage. Decreases wild encounter rate.

name: Iron Barbs
description: Deals 1/8 recoil damage when the opponent makes contact.

name: Iron Fist
description: Increases the power of punching moves by 20%.

name: Justified
description: Raises Attack by one stage when hit by a Dark-type move.

name: Keen Eye
description: Pokemon's accuracy cannot be lowered. Opponent's evasion boosts are ignored. Decreases wild encounter rate.

name: Klutz
description: This Pokemon both is unaffected by and will not utilize held items.

name: Leaf Guard
description: Prevents status effects in sun.

name: Levitate
description: This Pokemon is immune to Ground-type moves.

name: Light Metal
description: The wielder's weight is halved.

name: Lightningrod
description: All Electric-type attacks target this Pokemon. Grants immunity to Electric-type moves and boosts Special Attack by 1 stage when hit by an Electric-type move.

name: Limber
description: Blocks paralysis.

name: Liquid Ooze
description: Leeching moves cause the enemy to lose HP instead.

name: Magic Bounce
description: Bounces back certain non-damaging moves.

name: Magic Guard
description: Prevents indirect damage.

name: Magician
description: If this Pokemon is not holding an item, it steals the held item of a target it hits with a move.

name: Magma Armor
description: Cannot be frozen. Halves the amount of steps required to hatch Eggs.

name: Magnet Pull
description: Prevents Steel-type Pokemon from switching. Increases the chance of encountering a Steel-type Pokemon in the wild.

name: Marvel Scale
description: Boosts Defense 50% when afflicted by a non-volatile status.

name: Mega Launcher
description: Boosts the power of Aura and Pulse moves, such as Aura Sphere and Dark Pulse, by 50%.

name: Minus
description: If allied with a Pokemon with Plus or Minus, its Special Attack increases by 50%.

name: Mold Breaker
description: Abilities that hinder attacks are nullified.

name: Moody
description: A random stat is lowered by 1 stage and another is boosted by 2 stages every turn.

name: Motor Drive
description: Grants immunity to Electric-type moves and boosts Speed by 1 stage when hit by a Electric-type move.

name: Moxie
description: Boosts Attack by 1 stage if the wielder knocks out another Pokemon.

name: Multiscale
description: Reduces damage by 50% if the wielder is at full health.

name: Multitype
description: Type changes depending on the held plate. Prevents item loss.

name: Mummy
description: The opponent's ability becomes Mummy when it hits the wielder with a contact move.

name: Natural Cure
description: Cures status on switching out.

name: No Guard
description: All attacks used by and used on this Pokemon will never miss.

name: Normalize
description: All moves used by this Pokemon become Normal-type.

name: Oblivious
description: Grants immunity to infatuation, Captivate, and Taunt.

name: Overcoat
description: Grants immunity to damage from weather effects and powder moves.

name: Overgrow
description: Raises the power of Grass-type moves by 50% when at 1/3 HP or less.

name: Own Tempo
description: Cannot be confused.

name: Parental Bond
description: Allows the Pokemon to hit twice with the same move in one turn. Second hit has 0.5x base power. Does not affect Status, multihit, self-KO, or spread moves (in doubles).

name: Pickpocket
description: The wielder immediately steals an item from an attacker using a contact move.

name: Pickup
description: If the wielder has no held item, it gets the last item consumed at the end of the turn. Adds a chance of finding an item after each battle.

name: Pixilate
description: Turns all of this Pokemon's Normal-typed attacks into Fairy-type and deals 1.3x damage. Does not affect Hidden Power.

name: Plus
description: If allied with a Pokemon with Plus or Minus, its Special Attack increases by 50%.

name: Poison Heal
description: Heals 1/8 of max HP per turn when poisoned.

name: Poison Point
description: Enemies' contact moves have a 30% chance of poisoning them.

name: Poison Touch
description: The wielder's contact moves gain a 30% chance to poison the opponent.

name: Prankster
description: Non-damaging moves have their priority increased by one level.

name: Pressure
description: Enemy attacks lose 1 extra PP. Increases wild encounter rate.

name: Primordial Sea
description: Summons Heavy Rain until Pokemon leaves battle. Fire-type moves and weather changing moves/abilities fail, except for Desolate Land and Delta Stream.

name: Protean
description: Right before this Pokemon uses a move, it changes its type to match that move. Hidden Power is interpreted as its Hidden Power type, rather than Normal.

name: Pure Power
description: Doubles Attack.

name: Quick Feet
description: Increases Speed by 50% when afflicted with a status condition.

name: Rain Dish
description: Heals 1/16 of max HP in rain.

name: Rattled
description: Raises Speed one stage when hit by a Bug-, Dark-, or Ghost-type move.

name: Reckless
description: Increases the power of recoil moves by 20%.

name: Refrigerate
description: Turns all of this Pokemon's Normal-typed attacks into Ice-typed and deal 1.3x damage. Does not affect Hidden Power.

name: Regenerator
description: Wielder heals 1/3 of its maximum HP on switching out.

name: Rivalry
description: Raises move power by 25% if the opponent has the same gender, and reduces by 25% if the opponent has the opposite gender. Genderless Pokemon do not affect this ability.

name: Rock Head
description: Negates recoil from recoil moves.

name: Rough Skin
description: Deals 1/8 recoil damage when the opponent makes contact.

name: Run Away
description: Increases the chance of successfully escaping battle with a wild Pokemon.

name: Sand Force
description: Increases power of Ground-, Rock-, and Steel-type attacks by 30% in a sandstorm.

name: Sand Rush
description: Speed doubles in sandstorm.

name: Sand Stream
description: Summons sandstorm.

name: Sand Veil
description: Evasion increases by 20% in a sandstorm.

name: Sap Sipper
description: Grants immunity to Grass-type moves and boosts Attack by 1 stage when hit by a Grass-type move.

name: Scrappy
description: Can hit Ghost-types with Fighting- and Normal-type moves.

name: Serene Grace
description: This Pokemon's secondary effect chances are doubled.

name: Shadow Tag
description: Traps opponents. Does not affect Pokemon with Shadow Tag.

name: Shed Skin
description: 30% chance to heal status.

name: Sheer Force
description: Increases power of moves with secondary effects by 30%, but removes the effects.

name: Shell Armor
description: Prevents critical hits.

name: Shield Dust
description: Secondary effects won't occur.

name: Simple
description: Doubles the effect of stat boosts and drops.

name: Skill Link
description: Multi-hit moves will always hit the maximum number of times.

name: Slow Start
description: Attack and Speed are halved for 5 turns.

name: Sniper
description: Critical hits do 2.25x damage instead of 1.5x.

name: Snow Cloak
description: Evasion increases by 20% in hail.

name: Snow Warning
description: Summons hail.

name: Solar Power
description: Loses 10% HP in sun each turn. Special Attack increases by 50%.

name: Solid Rock
description: Reduces damage from super effective hits by 1/4.

name: Soundproof
description: Unaffected by sound moves.

name: Speed Boost
description: Speed raises at end of turn.

name: Stall
description: This Pokemon moves last.

name: Stance Change
description: Only affects Aegislash. If this Pokemon uses a Physical or Special move, it changes to Blade forme. If this Pokemon uses King's Shield, it changes to Shield forme.

name: Static
description: Enemies' contact moves can paralyze them.

name: Steadfast
description: Speed is boosted one stage when flinched.

name: Stench
description: Adds a 10% flinch chance for moves that do not have one. Decreases wild encounter rate.

name: Sticky Hold
description: This Pokemon's item cannot be removed. Increases the chance of encountering Pokemon while fishing.

name: Storm Drain
description: All Water-type attacks target this Pokemon. Grants immunity to Water-type moves and boosts Special Attack by 1 stage when hit by a Water-type move.

name: Strong Jaw
description: This Pokemon receives a 50% power boost for jaw attacks such as Bite and Crunch.

name: Sturdy
description: The wielder cannot be KO'd in one hit. OHKO moves will fail.

name: Suction Cups
description: Cannot be forced to switch. Increases chance of encountering Pokemon while fishing.

name: Super Luck
description: Critical hit rate increases one stage.

name: Swarm
description: Boosts power of Bug-type moves by 50% when at 1/3 HP or less.

name: Sweet Veil
description: Prevents allies from being put to Sleep.

name: Swift Swim
description: Speed doubles in rain.

name: Symbiosis
description: This Pokemon immediately passes its item to an ally after their item is consumed.

name: Synchronize
description: When statused, the enemy is also statused. Can pass nature to wild Pokemon.

name: Tangled Feet
description: Evasion increases when confused.

name: Technician
description: Increases power of moves with 60 base power or less by 50%.

name: Telepathy
description: Does not take damage from allies' attacks.

name: Teravolt
description: Abilities that hinder attacks are nullified.

name: Thick Fat
description: Halves Ice- and Fire-type damage.

name: Tinted Lens
description: Doubles damage on resisted hits.

name: Torrent
description: Boosts power of Water-type moves by 50% when at 1/3 HP or less.

name: Tough Claws
description: This Pokemon's contact attacks do 1.33x damage.

name: Toxic Boost
description: Attack is increased by 50% when poisoned.

name: Trace
description: Copies foe's ability.

name: Truant
description: This Pokemon does nothing every other turn.

name: Turboblaze
description: Abilities that hinder attacks are nullified.

name: Unaware
description: Ignores stat boosts and debuffs on other Pokemon.

name: Unburden
description: Speed increases when an item is used or lost.

name: Unnerve
description: Prevents the foe from consuming its held Berry item.

name: Victory Star
description: Increases the accuracy of the wielder and allies on its side of the field by 10%.

name: Vital Spirit
description: Prevents sleep. Increases wild encounters with higher level Pokemon.

name: Volt Absorb
description: Heals 25% HP when hit by an Electric-type attack.

name: Water Absorb
description: Heals 25% HP when hit by a Water-type attack.

name: Water Veil
description: Prevents burn.

name: Weak Armor
description: Boosts Speed by 1 stage and lowers Defense by 1 stage when hit by a Physical move.

name: White Smoke
description: Prevents the enemy from lowering this Pokemon's stats and decreases wild encounter rate.

name: Wonder Guard
description: Only super effective attacks harm this Pokemon.

name: Wonder Skin
description: Reduces the accuracy of a status move to 50%.

name: Zen Mode
description: The wielder changes forme when below 50% of its max HP.
